fr.upmc.components.interfaces

Interface OfferedI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ComponentImplementedI, java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ArrayBlockingQueueConnectionI, ArrayBlockingQueuePutI, ArrayBlockingQueueTakeI, CountDownLatchConnectionI, CountDownLatchI, CyclicBarrierConnectionI, CyclicBarrierI, DataInboundPortI, DataOfferedI, DataOfferedI.PullI, DataOutboundPortI, DataRequiredI.PushI, DataTwoWayConnectorI, DataTwoWayI, DataTwoWayI.PullI, DataTwoWayI.PushI, DataTwoWayPortI, DynamicallyConnectableComponentI, DynamicComponentCreationI, DynamicConnectionRequestI, InboundPortI, PairedGaugeI, RNGDataOfferedI, RNGTriggerI, SemaphoreConnectionI, SemaphoreI, SensorDataOfferedI, SynchronizerManagerI, TwoWayConnectorI, TwoWayI, TwoWayPortI, URIProviderI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDataInboundPort, AbstractDataOutboundPort, AbstractDataTwoWayConnector, AbstractDataTwoWayPort, AbstractInboundPort, AbstractTwoWayConnector, AbstractTwoWayPort, ArrayBlockingQueueConnectionInboundPort, ArrayBlockingQueuePutInboundPort, ArrayBlockingQueueTakeInboundPort, CountDownLatchConnectionInboundPort, CountDownLatchInboundPort, CyclicBarrierConnectionInboundPort, CyclicBarrierInboundPort, DataTwoWayConnector, DynamicallyConnectableComponentConnector, DynamicallyConnectableComponentInboundPort, DynamicallyConnectableComponentOutboundPort, DynamicComponentCreationConnector, DynamicComponentCreationInboundPort, DynamicComponentCreationOutboundPort, DynamicConnectionRequestConnector, DynamicConnectionRequestInboundPort, DynamicConnectionRequestOutboundPort, PairedGaugeConnector, PairedGaugePort, RNGDataInboundPort, RNGDataOutboundPort, RNGTriggerInboundPort, SemaphoreConnectionInboundPort, SemaphoreInboundPort, SensorDataInboundPort, SensorDataOutboundPort, SensorSimulator.BridgeDataOutboundPort, SynchronizerManagerInboundPort, URIProviderInboundPort

    public interface OfferedI
extends ComponentImplementedI, java.rmi.Remote
    The interface OfferedI represents the most general offered interface for a component in this component model.

    Description

    Components have required and offered interfaces. Required interfaces are the ones through which the component calls its companion components to obtain services and data from them. Offered interfaces are the ones through which a component is called to deliver services and data.

    Created on : 2011-10-31
